output.name: still
output.value: 'Stay still or I will enable the alarm!'

output.name: betterHide
output.value: 'I better stay here. There is a spot to hide.'

output.name: mustAttack
output.value: 'The guard saw me. I better attack him at once!'

output.name: attackOrLeave
output.value: 'Guard has not seen me. It is better to return to previous room or attack him!'

output.name: laserAlert
output.value: You came in contact with laser and the alarm has been enabled!

output.name: laserAlreadyAlert
output.value: You came in contact with laser and now they know where you are!

output.name: cameraAlert
output.value: They saw you on camera and enabled the alarm!

output.name: cameraAlreadyAlert
output.value: They saw you on camera!

output.name: deadend
output.value: Deadend!

output.name: disableAlertWithFiles
output.value: 'The alarm is disabled and I have the files in my hands! I won!'

output.name: hide
output.value: You hide for some time and the alarm is disabled.

output.name: disableSecuritySystems
output.value: You disabled the security systems (cameras and laser) in all explored rooms.

output.name: fightAndLose
output.value: You fight with the guard but he resists!

output.name: fightAndLoseEnableAlert

output.name: fightAndWin
output.value: You fight with the guard and you win!

output.name: shootClose
output.value: You use your gun from a very close distance.

output.name: shootFar
output.value: You use your gun from distance.

output.name: getFilesAndWin
output.value: 'I found the files! I won!
